title: Key Battles of the Revolutionary War, Part 6: Bunker Hill (2/2)
description: "Dont' fire till you see the white's of their eyes!" -- famous words, and smart strategy for using terribly inaccurate muskets,  but what were the conditions that gave arise to that advice? Find out in this episode, as the Battle of Bunker hill wraps up.
itunes:author: Scott Rank, PhD
